title: Garlic Shrimp Ramen
directions: Add olive oil and garlic in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat; cook for 1 minute or until fragrant.
Add shrimp and season with salt and pepper; cook for 2 minutes on each side.
Increase heat to medium-high and add butter; cook until butter is melted and shrimp is pink with browned edges.
Transfer to a platter and set aside. DO NOT clean the skillet.
Return skillet to stove and add 2 tablespoons olive oil; cook over medium-high heat until hot.
Add onions and broccoli; season with salt and pepper and cook for 5 minutes, or until tender.
Add broken noodles and vegetable broth to the skillet; mix in previously prepared shrimp and bring mixture to a boil.
Cook and stir for about 5 minutes, or until noodles are tender and most of the liquid is absorbed.
Remove from heat and let stand couple minutes.
ingredients: salt and fresh ground pepper , to taste
salt and fresh ground pepper , to taste
2 packages (3 ounces each) ramen noodles, broken (discard flavor packet)
